mapper.select:
select BOOK_NAME, TITLE, HERO, LANDMARK, TIMES, URBAN, ADDRESS, REL_HERO, REL_LANDMARK, REL_BOOK, COMPANION, SEARCH_TIME, TICKETS, ANECDOTE, X, Y, Z, MAP_STATUS, REMARK from don_wlxf_map where MAP_STATUS = '1'
and BOOK_NAME = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select DISTINCT BOOK_NAME label, BOOK_NAME val from don_wlxf_map where MAP_STATUS = '1' AND BOOK_NAME IS NOT NULL AND BOOK_NAME != ''
